<div class="columns-2">
<div id="lower_right-img"> <img src="img/umass.jpg" width=250 height=90>

- More self-assurance

- Less anxiety

Bonus round:

- Stronger sense of belonging
- Improved confidence
- Increased professional network

## What makes a good mentor?

- Excellent listening skills 
- Willingness to honestly share experiences
- Interest in sharing resources
- Understanding that you are but one of many influences

## What makes a good mentee?

- Actively participating in your own growth
- Maintaining your critical faculties and personal judgment
- Willingness to retain responsibility for your own success
- Remaining open to many influences
